name: Re-Spawn
description:
Made for Wowiiiie Game Jam 2021!
The theme was: Failure is Progress! 

Press L to debug restart you character.

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqrC3nWbfUVjy5Y4gm1VkwA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlazerChlopiec

Music and sound effects: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/sound-effects-search.php?q=

Instruction:

  • Press A or D to move around
  • W or Space to jump
  • Hold LMB to throw
  • Hold R to reset the orb
  • Remember that the orb is your respawn position!
  • Fix the game by placing the orb back at its place at the end.
